```py
SELECT driverslicensenr, name 
FROM Drivers 
WHERE driverslicensenr = 123456 
OR driverslicensenr = 678910 
OR driverslicensenr = 345678;
```

```py
SELECT driverslicensenr, name 
FROM Drivers 
WHERE driverslicensenr IN (123456, 678910, 345678);
```

```py
SELECT driverslicensenr, name 
FROM Drivers 
WHERE NOT (year > 1980);
```

```py
SELECT driverslicensenr, name 
FROM Drivers 
WHERE year >= 1960 AND year <= 1980;
```

```py
SELECT driverslicensenr, name 
FROM Drivers 
WHERE year BETWEEN 1960 AND 1980;
```

```py
SELECT driverslicensenr, name 
FROM Drivers 
WHERE year + 10 = 1980;
```

```py
SELECT driverslicensenr, name 
FROM Drivers 
WHERE year = 1970;
```

```py
SELECT state, COUNT(*) 
FROM Drivers 
WHERE state IN ('GA', 'TX') 
GROUP BY state 
ORDER BY state
```

```py
SELECT state, COUNT(*) 
FROM Drivers 
GROUP BY state 
HAVING state IN ('GA', 'TX') 
ORDER BY state
```
